external_games.name: Nations At War Digital: Stalin's Triumph Battlepack 1

name: Nations At War Digital: Stalin's Triumph Battlepack 1
summary: Stalin's Triumph Battlepack 1 brings us to the endless plains of the Soviet Union in July 1943. Stalin's Triumph Battlepack 1 includes 13 scenarios in a clash of the giants, the Soviet Red Army defends the Motherland against its German invaders.
